definition[0]: to pay someone too little for their work
definition[1]: to pay less money to people than they deserve for their work
example[0]: In an interview, the star said that the studio underpays and misuses him.
definition[2]: to pay less money to a person or organization than is owed to them
example[1]: The construction company had underpaid its income, employment and excise taxes by $3.2 billion over an eleven-year period.
